    • removeAllOtherHighlightedBlocks

      public static void removeAllOtherHighlightedBlocks(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, List<org.bukkit.Location> nonRemoveLocations)
      Remove all highlighted blocks for a player other than those in the same group as one of the nonRemoveLocations.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to remove the blocks for
      nonRemoveLocations - The blocks to prevent removal of (will also prevent removal for blocks in the same group)
